content: this is it the totally utilitarian dishtowel it ain t pretty it ain t meant to be use it abuse it when it wears out make another one it s a quick pattern and uses approx 3 5 balls of 50g of worsted weight kitchen cotton want to make a matching dishtowel that s a little nicer then you can also make the striped cotton dishtowel 1 this is now available as a free ravelry download enjoy **update 12/2/09 pattern has been reformatted please feel free to download new version ** 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/striped-cotton-dishtowel
